hasDitaContent.@value: Primidone is predicted to decrease the concentration of posaconazole. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Primidone   is predicted to   decrease   the concentration of   posaconazole .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Posaconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to propafenone. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Posaconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   propafenone .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Posaconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to quetiapine. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Posaconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   quetiapine .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rabeprazole decreases the absorption of posaconazole oral suspension. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rabeprazole   decreases   the absorption of   posaconazole   oral suspension .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Ranitidine is predicted to decrease the exposure to posaconazole. Manufacturer advises avoid use of posaconazole oral suspension.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Ranitidine   is predicted to   decrease   the exposure to   posaconazole .  Manufacturer advises avoid use of posaconazole oral suspension .

hasDitaContent.@value: Posaconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to ranolazine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Posaconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   ranolazine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Posaconazole increases the concentration of rifabutin and rifabutin decreases the concentration of posaconazole. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifampicin is predicted to decrease the exposure to posaconazole. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifampicin   is predicted to   decrease   the exposure to   posaconazole .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Posaconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to riociguat. Manufacturer advises adjust riociguat dose and monitor blood pressure.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Posaconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   riociguat .  Manufacturer advises adjust  riociguat  dose and monitor blood pressure .

hasDitaContent.@value: Sodium zirconium cyclosilicate is predicted to decrease the exposure to posaconazole. Manufacturer advises separate administration by at least 2 hours.

hasDitaContent.@value: Posaconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to tezacaftor. Manufacturer advises adjust dose with moderate CYP3A4 inhibitors, see tezacaftor with ivacaftor and tezacaftor with ivacaftor and elexacaftor.
